findAPet: We help you find pets for adoption
textFindAPet: Pets love is a tool designed for the management of pet shelters. Its main function is to be able to control and monitor the different stages of adoption, taking into account the main needs that are required to keep the pet healthy and happy.
ideals: Pets love was born from the idea that we can all be happy if we have the necessary resources. Pets need us to be able to have a life full of pleasant moments and technology gives us the possibility of building that reality.
usePetsLoveExplication: To use the application you do not need to install it! Just opening the browser on your phone or your computer is enough. Pets love gives animal lovers the ability to help them find a home and closely monitor each adoption.
responsibleAdoptionText: When adopting a pet, the shelter and the adopter will be able to monitor the main care of a pet in a precise manner. One of the goals of this app is to create a data base collecting relevant information such as medical records and pictures. Thus, generating a record that seeks to guarantee the safety and health of the pet.
titleVolunteers: Would you like to be a volunteer and do pet transit?
textVolunteers: If you are passionate about animals and want to be a part of caring for pets during the adoption process, sign up as a volunteer so shelters can contact you. By participating as a volunteer you will have a record of the pets you cared for and be able to share accurate information with the shelter and the adopter.
vetText: As a veterinarian, you can create a medical profile for pets in a fast and organized way. Moreover, you will be able to save and share relevant information with your clients, such as vaccinations, notes on diseases and last visit to the praxis.
helpToPetMessage: Let's make millions of pets get a home.
